panels.description: The error rate of the server in the selected time range.
panels.title: Server errors

panels.description: The current status of the servers. BEWARE this is a gauge metric. That means the accuracy will depend on your scrape interval, so if the status change is very quick, no changes will appear on this panel.
panels.title: Server status

panels.description: The maximum allowed concurrency for the server via configuration. Refers to WithMaxConcurrency() option.
panels.title: Server Max concurrency

panels.description: The current number of handlers in execution.
panels.title: Server concurrency (avg of all servers)

panels.description: The rate of messages received by the server.
panels.title: Server message received rate (rps)

panels.description: The server message sent ratemin RPS
panels.title: Server message sent rate (rps)

panels.description: The error rate of the clients in the selected time range.
panels.title: Client errors

panels.description: The current status of the clients.BEWARE this is a gauge metric. That means the accuracy will depend on your scrape interval, so if the status change is very quick, no changes will appear on this panel.
panels.title: Client status

panels.description: The maximum allowed concurrency for the client via configuration. Refers to WithMaxConcurrency() option.
panels.title: Client Max concurrency (avg of all clients)

panels.description: The current number of handlers in execution.
panels.title: Client concurrency (avg of all clients)

panels.description: The client message receive rate RPS.
panels.title: Client message received rate (rps)

panels.description: The client message sent ratemin RQPS
panels.title: Client message sent rate (rps)

panels.description: The sent message sizes distribution per message kind.
panels.title: Server message sent sizes

panels.description: The sent message sizes distribution per message kind.
panels.title: Client message sent sizes

panels.description: The time a message spent in the wire since sent from the client to the server.
panels.title: Server message received in-flight time

panels.description: The time a server message handler spends processing a message.
panels.title: Message processing time

panels.description: The size of messages that the server receives.
panels.title: Message received size

panels.description: The time a message broadcast leaves the server. Measures the time of the whole operation, which can involve multiple messages. WARNING, this only indicates the time server flushes data to the buffer. High times could indicate contention due to the client not acking messages.
panels.title: Broadcast operation time

panels.description: The time a message leaves the server. WARNING, this only indicates the time server flushes data to the buffer. High times could indicate contention due to the client not acking messages.
panels.title: Message sent time

panels.description: The size of messages that leaves the server.
panels.title: Message sent size

panels.description: The number of message published by the server.
panels.title: Pub/sub publish rate

panels.description: The number of message published by the server.
panels.title: Pub/sub publish rate

panels.description: The number of unsubscriptions that took place in the server.
panels.title: Pub/sub unsubscribe rate

panels.description: The number of broadcasts that took place in the server.
panels.title: Broadcast client rate

panels.description: The time a message spent in the wire since sent from the server to the client.
panels.title: Message received in-flight time

panels.description: The time a client message handler spends processing a message.
panels.title: Message processing time

panels.description: The size of messages that the client receives.
panels.title: Message received size

panels.description: The size of messages that leaves the client.
panels.title: Message sent size

panels.description: The time a message leaves the client. WARNING, this only indicates the time server flushes data to the buffer. High times could indicate contention due to the servre not acking messages.
panels.title: Message sent time

panels.description: The time between a synchronous message is sent to the server and the arrive of its respective reply.
panels.title: Message sync roundtrip time

panels.description: The number of publish commands requested to the server by clients. This does not guarantee the message is published.
panels.title: Pub/sub publish cmd rate

panels.description: The number of publish commands requested to the server by clients. This does not guarantee the message is published.
panels.title: Pub/sub publish cmd rate

panels.description: The number of unsubscribe commands requested to the server by clients. This does not guarantee the unsubscription is effective.
panels.title: Pub/sub unsubscribe cmd rate

panels.description: The number of broadcast commands requested to the server by clients. This does not guarantee the messages were broadcast.
panels.title: Broadcast cmd rate
